title: Bitcoin Suddenly Braced For $37 Trillion Fed Price Earthquake As Trump Suddenly Flips
description: The bitcoin price is braced for a Federal Reserve earthquake after Trump renewed his attacks...
content:
Bitcoin has surged over the last year, helped by U.S. president Donald Trumps prediction that massive bitcoin and crypto investment is coming.
Front-run Donald Trump, the White House and Wall Street… [+4638 chars]
